attributes.action: Order a review of all speed limits to rationlise them to realistic levels to reflect the actual road conditions and usage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speed limts need to be reviewed to permit increased safety and less road crowding In the main caused by deliberate endangerment of car drivers by road designers. (see Car insurers report on the subject)
Motorways speeds need to increase while 'time of day' relevant low speed limits are needed around schools etc during entrance and departure times

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
